prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of a colossal bio-android warrior, flawless green chitinous exoskeleton with dark black spots, imposing regal head horns, giant black insectoid eyes, large folded black biomechanical wings, imposing stance
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, extreme texture detail on chitin, wet biological sheen, volumetric rim lighting defining the segments, sharp focus, menacing presence
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, human proportions, fleshy texture, fleshy face, doll, toy, yellow skin, flat lighting, blurry wings
